Description: Papyrus fragment bearing a three line Coptic text written along the fibres (recto), and five much smaller fragments, four of which have traces of writing on one or both sides. Mounted with EA 10129, 10140, 10141, 10455-6, 10458, 10462.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380626) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380626)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
